item.title: A Practical Guide to Supporting Reforestation
item.description: While many are talking about deforestation and climate change, we don’t hear nearly enough about reforestation. This guide attests the importance of reforestation, tackles the controversy of flying abroad to volunteer and explains how we can all contribute. What is the current state of forests globally? In the Amazon, it’s estimated that an area the size of a football field is cleared every minute . One study estimates that since the beginning of human civilisation we’ve reduced the number of trees on the planet by almost half.
